trans-unit.source: NOTE: Pylo has been retired in favor of pyvisfile.
trans-unit.target: NOTE: Pylo has been retired in favor of pyvisfile.

trans-unit.source: Pylo allows you to write Silo visualization files, as introduced by LLNL’s MeshTV and more recently used by the VisIt large-scale visualization program. Check the VisIt source page for the latest Silo source code.
trans-unit.target: Pylo allows you to write Silo visualization files, as introduced by LLNL’s MeshTV and more recently used by the VisIt large-scale visualization program. Check the VisIt source page for the latest Silo source code.

trans-unit.source: Pylo supports the majority of datatypes allowed in Silo files, such as unstructured and rectangular structured meshes, particle meshes, as well as scalar and vector variables on them. In addition, Pylo supports expressions of scalar variables and semi-automatic writing of parallelization-segmented Silo files.
trans-unit.target: Pylo 支持 Silo 文件中允许的大多数数据类型,如非结构化和矩形结构化网格、粒子网格,以及其上的标量和矢量变量。此外,Pylo还支持标量变量的表达式和半自动编写并行化分段的Silo文件。

trans-unit.source: Pylo uses Boost.Python and PyUblas. To build it, please refer to the PyUblas documentation for build instructions first. After that, building pylo should be straightforward.
trans-unit.target: Pylo uses Boost.Python and PyUblas. To build it, please refer to the PyUblas documentation for build instructions first. After that, building pylo should be straightforward.
